name: Breeding Season
description:
A game under 3 hours, well almost 3:26h :), for the Trijam70 on itch.

Instructions.

User your mouse to fly to the next island (RED on the minimap) on the Minimap.

Use "Space" key to land on an island to recover health.

Find your breeding island (GREY on the minimap) to win the game.

I totally underestimated the the timeframe. :D Next time I need better preparation and smaller scope, but it was still quite fun.

Graphics made with Aseprite and Unity.

Here -> Sourcecode :)
